column4: skype has always worked pretty much flawlessly for me, aside from the ocassional person being listed as online when they're not.  And this is mac, windows, and linux.
How d'ya like the part where you can't have any other sound while in a call?
never been an issue I don't think.  could be because I run kde and arts I spose?
Yeah, I think it's an ESD or OSS thing.
